channel.title: Legacy Fantasy: Gauntlet Sunday (September)
channel.description:
![Legacy%20Fantasy%20Banner%20copy|690x230](upload://qMmUj0h6pMUkCE5E896Nq48A56m.jpeg) This is for five September sessions of *Legacy: Life Among the Ruins 2e*, but with a fantasy reskin. *Legacy* is PbtA game of generational play. We will be making small reading changes to put the game into a post-fall fantasy setting (like *Forbidden Lands*, etc) but will not make big rules changes. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged. Rules will be taught. In session one we will create the world and the characters—given the structure, this make take all of the session.
We will record the session and use the X-Card for safety. If you sign up and your attendance or RSVP changes, please also send me a message at edige23 at gmail. I will send out a group email a week before the session with set up and invite details.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) safety tool will be in use.
[date=2019-09-01 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-09-01 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ljs7EaieYykXzPXRg3v)
[date=2019-09-08 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-09-08 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ljs7Z4NlBtjFNoGVucl)
[date=2019-09-15 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-09-15 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ljs7rxKpS-ByDGTQp1i)
[date=2019-09-22 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-09-22 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ljs8IKP5P15w-AM3urr)
[date=2019-09-29 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-09-29 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 5](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Ljs8ZCuvloKGP5M4IzI)

item.title: Legacy Fantasy: Gauntlet Sunday (September)
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

Legacy%20Fantasy%20Banner%20copy1800×600 770 KB

This is for five September sessions of Legacy: Life Among the Ruins 2e, but with a fantasy reskin. Legacy is PbtA game of generational play. We will be making small reading changes to put the game into a post-fall fantasy setting (like Forbidden Lands, etc) but will not make big rules changes. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged. Rules will be taught. In session one we will create the world and the characters—given the structure, this make take all of the session.

We will record the session and use the X-Card for safety. If you sign up and your attendance or RSVP changes, please also send me a message at edige23 at gmail. I will send out a group email a week before the session with set up and invite details.

The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and the X-Card) safety tool will be in use.

Sunday, September 1, 2019 2:00 PM → Sunday, September 1, 2019 5:00 PM Session 1

Sunday, September 8, 2019 2:00 PM → Sunday, September 8, 2019 5:00 PM Session 2
